sn45.11:1.3: Namhi kenaci upasankamitabbo, annatra ekena pindapataniharakena”ti.
sn45.11:1.4: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato patissutva nassudha koci bhagavantam upasankamati, annatra ekena pindapataniharakena.
sn45.11:2.1: Atha kho bhagava tassa addhamasassa accayena patisallana vutthito bhikkhu amantesi:
sn45.11:2.2: “yena svaham, bhikkhave, viharena pathamabhisambuddho viharami, tassa padesena vihasim.
sn45.11:2.11: chando ca avupasanto hoti, vitakko ca avupasanto hoti, sanna ca avupasanta hoti, tappaccayapi vedayitam;
sn45.11:2.12: chando ca vupasanto hoti, vitakko ca vupasanto hoti, sanna ca vupasanta hoti, tappaccayapi vedayitam;
sn45.11:2.13: appattassa pattiya atthi ayamam, tasmimpi thane anuppatte tappaccayapi vedayitan’”ti.
